body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Oakwood Car Dealership. My name is Scott Jones. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Christina. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's 5 five five - 2 two 1 - 7 seven 8 eight 9 nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christina. And may I have your email address as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's c h a r i s s a at e x a m p l e dot c o m.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, I have noted down your contact information. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Actually, I'm feeling frustrated about the shipping process of my new car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Christina. Let me look into the matter and get back to you with a solution. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Christina. Have a great day!
